title: Make-Ahead Moroccan Lamb Stew
ingredients: 1 (15 ounce) can garbanzo beans, drained and rinsed
2 medium sweet potatoes, peeled and diced
method: Step 1: Combine cinnamon, cumin, salt, ginger, cloves, nutmeg, turmeric, and curry powder in a large bowl.
Step 2: Add lamb to spice mixture and mix until well combined.

Step 3: Melt butter in a large pot over medium heat. Add onion and sauté until soft and just beginning to brown, 5 to 10 minutes. Add spiced lamb; cook and stir until browned and crumbly, 6 to 8 minutes.
Step 4: Add consommé, garbanzo beans, beef broth, chicken broth, diced tomatoes, sweet potatoes, carrots, lentils, apricots, and honey; bring to a boil.
Step 5: Reduce the heat to low and simmer until vegetables and lentils are tender, about 30 minutes. Season with pepper.
